languages.text: Теодора фон Валанциус бесследно исчезла после того, как покинула офицерскую палубу. Что стало причиной этой пропажи?

traits.locale_text: Теодора фон Валанциус бесследно исчезла после того, как покинула офицерскую палубу. Что стало причиной этой пропажи?

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius vanished right after leaving the officers' deck. What could be behind her disappearance?
languages.original_text: Теодора фон Валанциус бесследно исчезла после того, как покинула офицерскую палубу. Что стало причиной этой пропажи?

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius vanished right after leaving the officers' deck. What could be behind her disappearance?
Theodora von Valancius vanished right after leaving the officers' deck. What could be behind her disappearance?
Theodora von Valancius vanished right after leaving the officers' deck. What could be behind her disappearance?

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius ist verschwunden, unmittelbar nachdem sie das Offiziersdeck verlassen hatte. Was könnte der Grund dafür sein?
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius vanished right after leaving the officers' deck. What could be behind her disappearance?

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius ist verschwunden, unmittelbar nachdem sie das Offiziersdeck verlassen hatte. Was könnte der Grund dafür sein?

languages.text: Théodora von Valancius s'est volatilisée juste après avoir quitté le pont des officiers. Que peut bien cacher sa disparition ?
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius vanished right after leaving the officers' deck. What could be behind her disappearance?

traits.locale_text: Théodora von Valancius s'est volatilisée juste après avoir quitté le pont des officiers. Que peut bien cacher sa disparition ?

languages.text: 西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯刚一离开军官甲板就不见了人影，这到底是怎么回事？
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius vanished right after leaving the officers' deck. What could be behind her disappearance?

traits.locale_text: 西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯刚一离开军官甲板就不见了人影，这到底是怎么回事？

languages.text: シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは士官デッキを出た直後に姿を消した。彼女の失踪が意味するものは何だろう？
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius vanished right after leaving the officers' deck. What could be behind her disappearance?

traits.locale_text: シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは士官デッキを出た直後に姿を消した。彼女の失踪が意味するものは何だろう？

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius ha desaparecido al poco de salir de la cubierta de oficiales. ¿Qué podría motivar su ausencia?
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius vanished right after leaving the officers' deck. What could be behind her disappearance?

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius ha desaparecido al poco de salir de la cubierta de oficiales. ¿Qué podría motivar su ausencia?

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius, subay güvertesinden ayrılır ayrılmaz sırra kadem bastı. Neden kaybolmuş olabilir?
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius vanished right after leaving the officers' deck. What could be behind her disappearance?

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius, subay güvertesinden ayrılır ayrılmaz sırra kadem bastı. Neden kaybolmuş olabilir?
